radiographic_examinations.findings: There remain patchy bibasal airspace opacities with minimal pleural effusions, manifested by blunting of the costophrenic angles posteriorly.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The pleural effusions are slightly smaller and the lung bases are better aerated. The airspace process largely persists and is arguably slightly more conspicuous on lateral projection, possibly due to bronchial thickening.
